description.description1: Software engineer with more than 6 years of experience working in international projects for clients of different sectors with the aim of help in their digital transformation.
description.description2: Mainly focused in frontend, I have experience with most of the frontend frameworks (VueJS, ReactJS, Angular). Recently I took the role of full-stack, having experience with some backend frameworks (NodeJS) and mobile frameworks (React Native).
description.description3: Experience working in Agile methodology within multicultural teams, in the client side and remotely. Contributing in all the project phases: planning, design of the solution, frontend tasks development, release to production and maintenance.
description.description4: I define myself as a proactive and resolutive person. I like challenges and keep learning every day.

workExperience.title: Work experience
workExperience.description: Proffesional projects can be found here

gofore.name: Software Developer at Gofore
gofore.description: As part of Gofore crew, I have been involved in different international projects. I'm also involved in different tasks for the Spanish's office like participating in technical interviews for potential candidates.

projects.title: Fullstack Development of a platform to support the digitalization of an occupational risk prevention company
projects.description: My main task is the web development using ReactJS/Typescript. I perform also the analysis and estimation of new features. As part of the multidisciplinar team, I'm working on backend tasks using NodeJS/Express/PostgreSQL. Recently I'm involved also in the mobile app development with React Native.

projects.title: Frontend Development of a web-based tool to classify and visualize social network hate speech in a dashboard
projects.description: My main tasks were to redesign and development of a web application using Angular/Typescript/Bootstrap/D3.

projects.title: Migration AngularJS to Angular and further development of a measurement equipment manufacturer platform
projects.description: Working for a leading measurement equipment manufacturer located in Finland that provides a cloud-based measurement data monitoring system, which allows customers to remotely monitor measurement and alarm information on sites. The project has the goal to update the current system technology stack to enable better performance and maintainability.

projects.title: Creation of a web editor for a map application
projects.description: My main tasks were to set up and development of a web application using ReactJS/Redux/Material UI/Here Maps.

projects.title: Creation of a Digital Signage Platform
projects.description: My main tasks were to design of the user interface in Sketch, setting up and implementation of an application ReactJS/Material UI and the integration with social media API (Outlook, Twitter and Slack).

accenture.name: Consultant at Accenture
accenture.description: Working on international projects for different banks with the aim of help them in their digital transformation. With my seniority and experience in different projects, I certificated myself as a trainer of the product that was integrated into the different customers.

projects.title: Digital Transformation of an Insurance Company
projects.description: As part of the multicultural agile team, I led the digital transformation of one of the largest insurance groups in its core markets of Austria and Central and Eastern Europe. I was responsible for:
tasks: Estimation, implementation and maintenance of the web application
Performance of code reviews for the software quality assurance
Migration of the Customer Experience Platform
Involvement in the continuous integration process

projects.title: Development of a digital bank application
projects.description: Participation in the digital transformation of an important financial group. I was responsible for:
tasks: Estimation of tasks, modeling forms and frontend development

projects.title: Development of a credit card portal
projects.description: Working in an international Agile project for an omnichannel credit card portal creation. I was responsible for:
tasks: Estimation of tasks and frontend development

projects.title: Development of different projects
projects.description: Development of new features and improvements of the company products as part of the R&D department. I was responsible for:
tasks: Integration of social networks inside a multichannel platform
Implementation of a workflow engine in a Java application

personalProjects.title: Personal Projects
personalProjects.description: Most relevant projects done in my personal time can be found here.

web-dosce.title: Dosce - Architecture and interior design
web-dosce.description: Design and development of an profesional architecture and interior design website. The website's development was design to allow the owner to update the content through the CMS but with the flexibility of using it as a headless in order to allow the development with modern frameworks.

web-elenaorfe.title: Personal Portfolio
web-elenaorfe.description: Design and development of a website to provide my portfolio (current website).

web-marinariera.title: Portfolio Art Curator
web-marinariera.description: Design and development of an art curator portfolio. The website's development was design to allow the owner to update the content through the CMS but with the flexibility of using it as a headless in order to allow the development with modern frameworks.

web-gs125.title: Scout Association
web-gs125.description: Redesign and development of the Wordpress theme for an association. The website's content is managed by the owner and mostly used to share the latest news and events related with the association.

course5.title: From the idea to the product

education2.title: IoT, Domotics and Smart Cities Master
